name: Auto-Summarize Breaking Financial News with AI and Save to Sheets
description:
This automation uses finlight, OpenAI, and Google Sheets to build your own AI-powered market intelligence tracker.
When breaking financial news is received via finlight’s webhook, the article content is passed to OpenAI GPT for summarization. The resulting summary—along with the headline, timestamp, and URL—is automatically saved to Google Sheets for reporting, research, or decision-making.
